name: .undefined
description:
CLICK HERE TO PLAY IT ON YOUR BROWSER Description When a mysterious murder happens in town, your job is to investigate its abnormal circumstances. This is a horror game experience where you will take the front seat of the uncanny. Take a deep breath and sign in for the tension! Do you have the nerves to find out what happened?

Headphones highly suggested.
Submission for Ludum Dare #43 COMPO
